sentences.en: Blooms of wildflowers sprout a bouquet of impromptu beauty.
sentences.cn: 野花依然绽放出即兴的美丽.

sentences.en: His call for a book of the trains had been a sheer piece of impromptu.
sentences.cn: 他打听火车时刻表只是一段纯粹的即兴曲.

sentences.en: I quite by chance got drawn into a kind of impromptu party downstairs.
sentences.cn: 我碰巧被拉去参加楼下那种临时组织起来的舞会.

sentences.en: I'm sure his remarks were rehearsed, not impromptu.
sentences.cn: 我肯定他的话是预先想好的, 不是即席讲的.

sentences.en: In between appearances on TV and radio broadcasts, Mr. Fletcher holds an impromptu news conference.
sentences.cn: 在电视和电台播出的空隙之间, 弗莱彻先生举行了一次临时记者招待会.

sentences.en: No diplomatic language was needed. A few impromptu fairy tales were enough.
sentences.cn: 这里不用任何外交辞令,只需要几句现编的童话.

sentences.en: Piano accompaniment for vocal music falls into two types: impromptu and written.
sentences.cn: 摘要声乐的钢琴伴奏,分为即兴伴奏和正谱伴奏两大类.

sentences.en: Some dance movements were composed impromptu , which were simple and standard.
sentences.cn: 又可即兴编舞,舞蹈动作洗练、规范.

sentences.en: The announcement was made in an impromptu press conference at the airport.
sentences.cn: 这一宣布是在机场举行的临时新闻发布会上作出的.

sentences.en: The children put on an impromptu concert for the visitors.
sentences.cn: 孩子们为来访者即兴献上了一场音乐会。

sentences.en: The President gave an impromptu press conference.
sentences.cn: 总统临时举行记者招待会.

sentences.en: They play an impromptu guerilla gig on the Beijing subway.
sentences.cn: 他们即兴发挥游击演出的北京地铁.

sentences.en: They presented impromptu items to greet the distinguished guests.
sentences.cn: 他们临时表演节目来欢迎贵宾.

sentences.en: This afternoon the Palestinians held an impromptu press conference.
sentences.cn: 今天下午巴勒斯坦方面临时召开了记者招待会。

sentences.en: When do we make impromptu speeches?
sentences.cn: 我们什么时候要做即席演讲？

sentences.en: When Marco was asked to give an impromptu speech on“Addictions,”he divided the topic /into/ several parts. Notice how he used the pattern of related subtopics in the outline that follows.
sentences.cn: 举个例子，马可要做一个关于“嗜好”的即席演讲，他将这个主题分成了几部分，注意下面他在大纲中是如何运用有关联副主题模式的。

sentences.en: Writing a 15-page analysis about their professor's movie, hundreds of impromptu speeches, reading a 150-page literature book are quite normal for them.
sentences.cn: 写出电影的15页分析，成百上千字的即席演讲，读150页的文学作品，这些对于他们来说都太正常了。

trans.tran_cn: 即席的，临时的，无准备的
trans.tran_en: done or said without any preparation or planning
